default.label: Default Layout
default.comment: It will be used for tag and archive actions. If not overriden by category settings, it will be set as blog default layout.

post_view.label: Layout for post single view
post_view.comment: Choose the layout of the single post/article.

page_var_name.label: Page parameter name
page_var_name.comment: The page parameter that will appear in _query in address bar.

filter_var_name.label: Filter parameter name
filter_var_name.comment: The filter parameter that will appear in _query in address bar.

max_posts_perpage.label: Number of posts listed
max_posts_perpage.comment: Number of posts shown in listing page.

teaser_words_count.label: Teaser words number
teaser_words_count.comment: Teaser is short content that will be shown in post listing and single page. If admin does not add the teaser, it will be taken from post content. Specify the number of words to take from content, if short content is empty.

listing_display_content.label: Available content
listing_display_content.comment: Select the content to be displayed during posts listing.

template.label: Display template
template.comment: Choose a template for your widget display the posts: -Minimal: Displays the image thumbnail, title and, optional, the date ; -Extended: Displays a chosen type of image, title and, optional, date, content, number of comments.

posts_in_widget.label: Number of posts visible
posts_in_widget.comment: There is a minimum of 1 to be shown.

content_length.label: Post content limit
content_length.comment: Number of words from the short content to be displayed in the widget.

posts_number.label: Number of posts visible
posts_number.comment: There is a minimum of 1 post to be shown.

widget_enable.label: Enable block
widget_enable.comment: Disabled: block will not be displayed.

header.label: Archive header and breadcrumb
header.comment: This will be set as header and as breadcrumb to the action page. Use %s in order to have period value inserted.

url_segment.label: Archive first segment
url_segment.comment: This is the first segment before archive unique path. Example: /archive/2015/02 or /arch/2015/02.

show_count.label: Show posts count
show_count.comment: Yes: will display posts count in parenthesis.

history_length.label: History length
history_length.comment: Number of years before the current year. 0 will display the current year only.

keep_url_structure.label: Keep old url structure
keep_url_structure.comment: Keep the old url structure for existent posts.

enabled.label: Enable block
enabled.comment: Disabled: block will not be displayed.

header.label: Tags header and breadcrumb
header.comment: This will be set as header and as breadcrumb to the action page. Use %s in order to have tag`s value inserted.

url_segment.label: Tag first url segment
url_segment.comment: This is the first segment before tag unique path. Example: /tag/unique-tag-url-10/ or /tag/unique-tag-url-10.html

enabled.label: Show block on product view page

limit.label: Number of posts to display
limit.comment: Write a number to limit the number of related articles in the block.

enabled.label: Show related products block
enabled.comment: Yes: the block will be visible on post single page. No: the block will be disabled.

limit.label: Number of products to display
limit.comment: Write a number to limit the number of related products to be displayed.

limit.label: Number of blog categories to display

enabled.label: Show block on category view page
enabled.comment: If you select "No", it won`t be rendered on any of the categories.

limit.label: Number of posts to display
limit.comment: Write a number to limit the related posts in the block.

enabled.label: Enable
enabled.comment: Yes: the RSS feed will be enabled.

limit.label: Number of posts to display
limit.comment: Write a number to limit the posts.

allowed_reply_level.label: Reply level
allowed_reply_level.comment: Set the maximum level for making a reply by typing a number between 1 and 10. Default is level 10.

auto_approve.label: Automatic approval
auto_approve.comment:
Yes: the comments will be automatically published.
No: the comments will be set as pending until the admin will publish them.

allow_guest_comments.label: Allow guest comments
allow_guest_comments.comment:
Yes: not logged in users (guests) will be able to add comments.
No: only logged in customers will be able to add comments.

content_words_number.label: Content words number
content_words_number.comment: Specify the number of words to take from content for the comments grid.

comments_notification.label: Enable comments notifications
comments_notification.comment: Yes: On the blog comments section (frontend) will be displayed a checkbox under each comment, and the user can specify if he/she wants to receive an email if someone replies on comment.

send_email_to.label: Send notification only to parent
send_email_to.comment:
Yes: the notification will be sent only to the parent comment.
No: the notification email will be sent to all level parents.

email_subject.label: Email subject for comment notifications
email_subject.comment: Set the subject for the comment notifications email.

akismet_api_key.label: API Key
akismet_api_key.comment: Provided API Key. Visit Akismet website to create an account. For details about generating the key check this tutorial.

enable_comments_widget.label: Show recent comments block
enable_comments_widget.comment: No: will disable comment block on the selected pages.

comments_number.label: No. of comments in the block
comments_number.comment: Insert a number bigger than zero (0).

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Enable the tab in customer account view.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Enable cronjob for deleting spam comments.

hourly.label: Hourly
hourly.comment: Yes for hourly cronjob or No for fixed date.

hour_number.label: Every X hours
hour_number.comment: Check for spam comments every X hours.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Enable cronjob for publish post at the scheduled date

custom.label: Use custom settings
custom.comment: No - cron job will be executed at every hour.

hourly.label: Hourly
hourly.comment: Yes for hourly cronjob or No for fixed date (daily).

hour_number.label: Every X hours
hour_number.comment: Check for posts every X hours.

encoding.label: Encoding
encoding.comment: If the inserted value will not be found in the encodings list, the default "UTF-8" type will be used.

subject.label: Required Subject
subject.comment: If "Yes":When the user submits a comment, the subject field will be required. If "No": the field will be optional.
